text: Pheri tyasapachi timra hrdayaharu dhungajasto baru tyo bhanda pani kathora bha'ihale kina bhane kehi dhunga ta yasta hunchan ki phutera tinabata naharaharu bagna thalchan. Ra kehi yasta hunchan ki phuti halchan ra tinabata pani niskancha. Ra kunai yasta hunchan ki allahako bhayale khasihalchan. Ra allaha timra kriyakalapabata anabhijna chaina
